author: tvami
body:
#### PR description:

Modifications to the Pixel CPE sqlite making codes so that they handle both Phase-1 and Phase-2 detectors.

#### PR validation:

A previously produced objects
```
SiPixelTemplateDBObject_phase2_IT_v6.1.5_25x100_v0_mc
SiPixelGenErrorDBObject_phase2_IT_v6.1.5_25x100_v0_mc
```
have been reproduced  as
```
SiPixelGenErrorDBObject_phase2_T15_v0_mc_25x100_test2
SiPixelTemplateDBObject_phase2_T15_v0_mc_25x100_test2
```
and residuals were run on them:
https://indico.cern.ch/event/934819/#58-testing-the-new-cpe-packagi
(The results are identical)

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

This is not a backport, and backport is not expected.

cc: @mmusich
title: Make CPE packaging code compatible with Phase-2 as well
